ValidationRule.description: If the Transaction type is Rental or Disaster, require the Term to be entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c ), OR( TEXT( Transaction_Type__c )="Rental", TEXT( Transaction_Type__c )="Disaster", TEXT( Transaction_Type__c )="Lodging") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Subscription Term (in # of months)
